trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Un objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent" /> event that is raised by visual design tools, such as Visual Studio 2005, implementing the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: Representa el método que va a controlar el evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent" /> generado por las herramientas de diseño visual, como Visual Studio 2005, que implementan la interfaz <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView" />.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se crea un delegado <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>, se identifica el método que controlará el evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para asociar el evento al controlador, se debe agregar una instancia del delegado al evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Siempre que se produce el evento, se llama a su controlador, a menos que se quite el delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre los delegados de controladores de eventos, vea [NIB: delegados y eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event is raised by the designer host for certain actions on a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> evento es desencadenado por el host del diseñador para determinadas acciones en un control en la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event is handled by a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method, which takes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> evento está controlado por un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegar el método, que toma un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> objeto como parámetro.

trans-unit.source: Typically, control designer classes do not directly implement or assign a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, las clases de diseñador de control no directamente implementar o asignar una <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> base class supplies a default delegate for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> clase base proporciona un delegado predeterminado para el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Custom control designers override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> methods to process those events for the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Diseñadores de controles personalizados reemplazan los <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, y <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> métodos para procesar los eventos del control en la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> method sets the default event delegate for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> delegate.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> método establece el delegado de eventos predeterminado para el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> delegar.
